Description: McKlein Mens ASHBURN 15.6" Leather Laptop Case in Brown Clean, front flap-over design with a secure clasp. Front section with an interior organizer for pens, business cards and small devices. Main compartment features dual secure zippers, space for files, built-in padded laptop sleeve and dual small accessory pockets. Quick, accessible back pocket for documents. Adjustable, non-slip, shock absorbing shoulder strap alleviates body strain. Main compartment features a built-in padded laptop sleeve that fits and protects most laptops up to 15.4” in screen size. Smart Zipper Attachment allows transport on extended handles of other rolling cases and luggage.
